
Test Structure
==============
You can write tests either in JSON format or in YAML format.
All tests are inside a structure with their name


Format
------

.. list-table:: 
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Format

     - JSON

     - YAML

   * - Filename

     - name-of-testFiller.json

     - name-of-testFiller.yml

   * - Format
 
     - 

       ::

           {
              "name-of-test": {
                  Sections go here
              }
           }

     - 

       ::

           name-of-test:
              Sections go here
